accountconfirmationemail.Subject: Confirmation Email
accountconfirmationemail.Body:
Hi <%= name %>,

Thank you for registering with The Village Nut Company.

Your confirmation code is <%= code %>

We look forward to journeying with you.

Incase of any queries, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Kind Regards

The Village Nut Company

registrationemail.Subject: Confirmation Code
registrationemail.Body:
Dear <%= name %>,

Thank you for registering with The Village Nut Company

Below is your account confirmation code

<%= code %>

Kind Regards

supportautoreply.Subject: Thank you for contacting us
supportautoreply.Body:
Hi <%= name %>,

Thank you for choosing The Village Nut Company as your number one on-line reading partner.

A support ticket has been created to help follow up with your queries/comments to us.

For follow up on any issue, please quote the ticket number <%= ticketno %> 

 

Kind Regards.

 

The Village Nut Company

SUPPORT TEAM

resetpasswordemail.Subject: Password Reset
resetpasswordemail.Body:
Hi <%= name %>, 

We have received a request to reset your password.  

Your new password is: <%=password%>

 If you did not request a password reset please ignore this email or reply to let us know.

 

Kind Regards.

 

The Village Nut Company

SUPPORT TEAM

changepasswordemail.Subject: Your password has been changed.
changepasswordemail.Body:
Hi <%=name%>, 

We have received your request to change the password.

Your new password is: <%=password%>

Please change your password after logging in the given password for security purposes.

If you did not request this password change, please ignore this email or reply to let us know.

 

Kind regards

The Village Nut Company

SUPPORT TEAM

orderreceivedemail.Subject: Sale Confirmation
orderreceivedemail.Body:
Hi <%=name%>, 

Thank you for your order. You can check the status of your order by logging into your account.

If you have any queries about your order please contact us at info@manifestedpublishers.com or you can call us on the following mobile numbers: +254 724 173845 / +254 735671798


Kind Regards

The Village Nut Company

orderpaymentemail.Subject: Order Confirmation
orderpaymentemail.Body:
Hi <%=name%>, 

Thank you for your order.

<%=orderno%> <%=paid%>

If you have any queries about your order please contact us at info@tvn.co.ke or you can call us on the following mobile numbers : +254 724 173845 / +254 735671798

 

Kind Regards

The Village Nut Company

referalemail.Subject: KASNEB Online Video Lectures
referalemail.Body:
Hello There,

Your friend <%=name%>, has has invited  you to become a partner

For more information, visit our website www.tvn.co.ke

 

Kind Regards

The Village Nut Company

contactus.title: Contact Us
contactus.body:
For any orders, queries or comments kindly contact us through

our email:  info@tvn.co.ke

OR

call us on the telephone numbers below
